loseFriends.name: How to Lose Friends
loseFriends.description: In this game, each participant's task is to choose the person who best fits the description on the question card. The player who collects the most 'votes' earns 1 point. Whoever collects the most points by the end of the evening may need to make new friends or consider changing their name and moving to another city

battleSee.name: Sea Battle
battleSee.description: This is a classic board game that takes you into the world of naval battles and tactical maneuvers. In this game, two players strive to sink the opponent's ships before their own vessels are destroyed

rsp.name: Rock Paper Scissors
rsp.description: Rock Paper Scissors is a classic game of luck and strategy. Two players simultaneously choose one of three figures: rock, scissors, or paper. Rock beats scissors, scissors beat paper, and paper beats rock.

spy.name: Spy
spy.description: Spy is a game where players try to figure out who the spy is by asking each other questions. One player is assigned the role of the spy and tries to guess the secret word without revealing their identity.

tod.name: Truth or Dare
tod.description: Truth or Dare is a classic party game where players take turns choosing between truth and dare. Choosing truth means the player must honestly answer a question, while a dare requires performing a task.

five_second.name: 5 Seconds
five_second.description: 5 Seconds is a fast and fun game where players must name three things in five seconds. For example, three types of fruit or three famous movies. If the player fails, the turn passes to the next player.

codenames.name: Codenames
codenames.description: Codenames is a team game where players try to guess words using clues. Two teams compete to be the first to find all their codenames on the board. The clue consists of one word and a number indicating the number of related words.
